about_the_game:
The Keep Defending demo contains two levels from the first-person VR tower defense archery game.

Start your journey with the first level "Homestead" which serves as an introduction to the game.

Then try your defensive tactics in the second demo level called "Highguard". This features two stages for you to survive the enemy onslaught. Shore up your defenses with crossbows, wizards, and brave knights as you stand against hordes of enemies. Can you face the dragons and score huge bonuses?



The full game of Keep Defending includes 10 levels of intense action and overwhelming odds including Ambush (stop enemies from escaping the map) and Advance (progress through multiple stages) type levels to complement the traditional Defense levels.
detailed_description:
The Keep Defending demo contains two levels from the first-person VR tower defense archery game.

Start your journey with the first level "Homestead" which serves as an introduction to the game.

Then try your defensive tactics in the second demo level called "Highguard". This features two stages for you to survive the enemy onslaught. Shore up your defenses with crossbows, wizards, and brave knights as you stand against hordes of enemies. Can you face the dragons and score huge bonuses?



The full game of Keep Defending includes 10 levels of intense action and overwhelming odds including Ambush (stop enemies from escaping the map) and Advance (progress through multiple stages) type levels to complement the traditional Defense levels.

name: Keep Defending Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP 1 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 980Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Keep Defending is a first-person VR tower defense archery game where you build up your defenses during the enemy onslaught. Target enemies before they reach your gate and earn gold to set up ever more capable defenses including crossbows, wizards, knights, cannons, and more.
